author: abcoathup
content:
There isn't a timeline.  Mainnet will be upgraded to Pectra when it is ready.

The next planned devnet is pectra-devnet-5 (hopefully will launch over the holidays).
Pectra spec is nearly finalized.
Further devnets may or may not be needed after that.

Sepolia & HoleÅ¡ky testnets will then be upgraded before mainnet.  There is generally a few weeks between each testnet and mainnet.
